title: We're miners and we know 歌詞翻譯
author: qwer3456
txt_content:
When we mine on by, creepers be thinking like "they must die", 
當我在礦坑中，苦力怕認為我們應該死
we mine to the beat, climbing down the mine with all our meat, yea
敲打著石頭，跟我們的肉一起爬下去，yea
This is how we roll, animal sex gone out control
這次我們退出，動物們瘋狂到無法控制
It's Jmart with the enchanted bow
Jmart拿著附魔的弓
Sniping monsters out like a pro, OH
把怪物都打飛，讓自己看起來是個高手，噢

Ahh bro look at that diamond(x3)
啊~~~看那些鑽石
I-I-I I'll mine it!
我將挖到它
Ahh bro look at that diamond(x3)
啊~~~看那些鑽石
I-I-I I'll mine it!
我將挖到它

When I swim down the river, yeah this is what I see, OK
當我游泳在河哩，對，那就是我所看到的。
All the squids stop and staring at me
所有得魷魚停下看著我
I got diamonds in my hands and I ain't afraid to show them, show them, show them show them
我把鑽石拿在我手裡，而且秀出來、秀出來、秀出來、秀出來


We're miners and we know it (x2)
我們是礦工所以我們知道

When we build a wall, we hold shift so we don't fall off
當我們在建造時，我們會按住shift確保我們不會掉下去。
And when we're at the beach, we're in the speedos trying to tan our cheeks.
我們在海灘上，我們會試著讓自己曬黑些
This is how we mine, come on pickaxe it's time to go
我們要回礦洞，來吧，拿起鎬是時間了。
We headed down the mine, guys just don't be nervous
我們已進礦洞為首要目標，所以別緊張
No clock, no compass, minecarts out of service 
沒有時鐘、沒有指南針、礦車也脫軌


Ahh bro look at that diamond(x3)
啊~~~看那些鑽石
I-I-I I'll mine it!
我將挖到它
Ahh bro look at that diamond(x3)
啊~~~看那些鑽石
I-I-I I'll mine it!
我將挖到它

When I swim down the river, yeah this is what I see, OK
當我游泳在河哩，對，那就是我所看到的。
All the squids stop and staring at me
所有得魷魚停下看著我
I got diamonds in my hands and I ain't afraid to show them, show them, show them show them
我把鑽石拿在我手裡，而且秀出來、秀出來、秀出來、秀出來


We're miners and we know it (x2)
我們是礦工所以我們知道


Check it out! (x2)
瞧瞧吧!


Wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, yeah
扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動，yeah
Wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, yeah
扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動，yeah
Wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, yeah
扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動，yeah
Wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, yeah, yeah
扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動、扭動，yeah, yeah
Do the wiggle man
做個扭動人
You did the wiggle man
你已經是了

We're miners and we know it

我們是礦工所以我們知道
